trans:
<Event precautions>
* Exposure to certain content, such as photography, voice recording, or stage footage, is strictly prohibited during this event. Additionally, the use of all digital devices, including smartwatches, is forbidden within the studio. Please be cautious, as any prohibited actions detected during recording may result in penalties for all participants.
==================
â–¶ Information on application to participate in Mnet M Countdown pre-recording
- Application date and time: October 14 (Mon), 2024, 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM (KST)
- Application link: Click [ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’Application for ParticipationğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’] at the bottom of the notice (Activate 20 minutes before application time)
*The participation application page will open 20 minutes before the event, so please access the application form in advance, fill in your personal information, review and consent to the collection/use of personal information, and submit your application on time.
â€» Once you click 'Application for Participation,' modifications to the application details will no longer be possible; therefore please ensure you complete the application correctly within the designated time.
â€» Winners will be selected on a first-come, first-served basis, based on applications received starting at 12:00 PM (KST), the announced application time.
** Please check the first-come, first-served basis, and entry number in the SEVENTEEN Weverse 'Event Application Details' 3 hours after the application deadline. (The winner announcement time may vary depending on the situation.)
